headline: Union Pacific Recognizes 16 Customers, Suppliers with Sustainability Partner Awards
summary: OMAHA, Neb., November 06, 2025--Union Pacific Railroad today recognized 16 customers and suppliers with its 2025 Sustainability Partner Awards, celebrating their commitment to advancing environmental stewardship and sustainable business practices. Now in its third year, the award program highlights organizations that are driving measurable progress toward ambitious sustainability goals through innovation, collaboration and leadership.
